services.title: Choose the coaching focus that fits your moment
services.description: Each pathway blends practical planning with reflective space so you can make grounded, values-led decisions.

cards.title: Career transitions

cards.title: Mid-career coaching

cards.title: Reset sprint

key_points.title: What you can expect
key_points.description: Coaching stays practical, bilingual, and paced so you can make steady moves.

items.title: Agree pace, goals, and support before we begin.
Switch between Mandarin and English without losing nuance.
Design experiments that respect energy, care, and capacity.

process.title: How we work together
process.description: A lightweight structure keeps momentum without overwhelming your schedule.

steps.title: Share context
steps.description: We map the transitions you are navigating, the stakeholders involved, and any immediate constraints.

steps.title: Design experiments
steps.description: We co-create small, testable actions that help you practise language, decisions, and boundaries.

steps.title: Review and recalibrate
steps.description: We check-in on outcomes, iterate your plan, and celebrate shifts without adding pressure.

boundaries.title: Boundaries that keep coaching safe
boundaries.description: These agreements help you stay in charge of the process.

items.question: What happens to the information I share?
items.answer: Notes stay between coach and client. We follow ICF-aligned confidentiality and data retention practices.

items.question: How do we handle sensitive topics?
items.answer: We name triggers early, pause when something feels unsafe, and signpost therapy or legal support when needed.

items.question: Can we adjust cadence if life gets busy?
items.answer: Yes. We co-design the rhythm of sessions and pause or slow down when capacity is stretched.
